title: september 18: on big comets and bigger pop stars
description:
Twinkle, twinkle, little, wait is that a comet? On today's episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia will be sharing a time when astronomers Kaoru Ikeya and Tsutomu Seki founded a comet with just their naked eye! No telescopes were used during this night sighting because of how close the comet was to the sun. As Maia goes into detail about this one-of-a-kind event, she will also share another trendsetting milestone in music history. Here’s a hint: Cause the players gonna play and the haters gonna hate, but you better not shake off listening to this podcast. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
